name: Little Girl First Spa & Salon
description:
Spa and salon is the best thing for girls. She is always happy to do win interesting activities like a makeover, dress up and other girly things. That's why we make this wonderful Little Girl First Spa and Salon game. In this game, girl wants to go the party and she needs pretty look. So can you help her for best look? First of all, give her refreshing bath for clean skin. After that, choose some amazing dress up accessories like a colorful outfit, stylish shoes, hairstyle, glasses, cap and much more. Once you are done with her look then enjoying DJ party and have a fun in this girls game.

Features:

- Perfect salon game for girls
- Wash clothes
- Wash her hair with soap
- Tons of different dress up accessories
- Use various salon tools to clean her up
- Easy to use controls for of all ages
